text: Hagi Jisasi'ene amagema nentaza disaipol naga'ane Jerusalemi kumate uhanati'zageno, Jisasi'a ra mono nompi mareriteno agafa huno maketima nehaza vahera zamahenati netreno, zagore netre'za miza nesaza vahe'mokizmi trara erikaha hunetreno, mani'ne'za maho nama zagore netraza tra'ene zagoma rezahema nehaza vahe trara erikaha hutre'ne.
